channel.title: Trying To Compile Server
channel.description: I'm trying to compile my server to see If people can join. Because I haven't compiled it at all. I KNOW It sais how to fix It on the tutorial thread, But I did that and Its still not working. I made the Compile file but It sais this: [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/166awqf.jpg[/img]

item.title: Trying To Compile Server
item.dc:creator: @Volrom Volrom
item.description:
@Volrom wrote:

Pure Goolo!

If the well coded compiler above does not work, use my Universial Server Compiler/Runner/Connector: FryScape. Go to this post, it has everything you need to download and run your server properly: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,261953.0.html
+1 rep to r3d th3m3 for a good job on his compiler.

-Volrom

Read full topic

item.title: Trying To Compile Server
item.dc:creator: @r3d_th3m3 r3d_th3m3
item.description:
@r3d_th3m3 wrote:

1-Open up your source.

2-Create a new text document

3-Open and put this in it:

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::							::
::	This Compiler is under no licenses and may	::
::	be distributed freely.				::
::							::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
title r3d th3m3's compiler
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

4-Click file - save as

5-Under file name put Compiler.bat
Under save as type put All files

6-Save and your done

Read full topic

item.title: Trying To Compile Server
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Goolo Pure Goolo
item.description:
@Pure_Goolo wrote:

Umm. I used It and it said
Javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use - help for a list of possible options
Finished!
Press any key to continue

Does this mean that It worked?

Read full topic

item.title: Trying To Compile Server
item.dc:creator: @jacobhankal jacobhankal
item.description:
@jacobhankal wrote:

  1. make sure you have jdk

  2. use my compiler

[code]@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

[/code]

Read full topic
